statements: SELECT purchase_id, product_name, supplier_name, purchase_date, purchase_quantity, purchase_price FROM PurchaseData;
SELECT product_name, purchase_quantity FROM PurchaseData;
SELECT * FROM PurchaseData WHERE purchase_price > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, purchase_date FROM PurchaseData ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(purchase_price) AS avg_price FROM PurchaseData;
SELECT * FROM PurchaseData ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, purchase_quantity ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, purchase_quantity FROM PurchaseData WHERE purchase_price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_quantity DESC
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, SUM(purchase_quantity) AS total_quantity, SUM(purchase_price) AS total_price FROM PurchaseData GROUP BY product_name, supplier_name
SELECT product_name, supplier_name, purchase_date FROM PurchaseData WHERE purchase_quantity > 50 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT AVG(purchase_quantity) AS avg_quantity, AVG(purchase_price) AS avg_price FROM PurchaseData
SELECT * FROM purchases;
SELECT item_name, purchase_amount FROM purchases WHERE supplier_name='Supplier1';
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_city, supplier_country FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_country='USA';
SELECT purchase_id, item_name, purchase_date FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM purchases;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount < 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT item_name, purchase_amount FROM purchases WHERE supplier_name = 'Supplier A'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 500
SELECT supplier_name, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase FROM purchases GROUP BY supplier_name
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_city, supplier_country FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_city = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM purchases;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchases;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_address FROM suppliers;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products;
SELECT purchase_date, total_amount, supplier_id FROM purchases ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date, total_amount FROM purchases JOIN suppliers ON purchases.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;

SELECT p.purchase_id, p.purchase_date, s.supplier_name, p.total_amount, pr.product_name FROM purchases p JOIN suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id JOIN products pr ON pr.product_id = p.purchase_id WHERE p.total_amount > 500 AND pr.unit_price < 100 ORDER BY p.purchase_date ASC, pr.product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM procurement_purchase_orders;
SELECT order_id, vendor_id, quantity FROM procurement_purchase_orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT vendor_name, email_address, phone_number FROM procurement_vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM procurement_products WHERE unit_price > 100 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_date, product_id, forecasted_quantity FROM procurement_forecasts WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM procurement_purchase_orders ORDER BY order_date DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, email_address FROM procurement_vendors WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM procurement_products WHERE stock_quantity < 100 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT vendor_id, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM procurement_purchase_orders GROUP BY vendor_id HAVING order_count > 5;
SELECT p.product_name, f.forecasted_quantity FROM procurement_products p JOIN procurement_forecasts f ON p.product_id = f.product_id WHERE f.forecast_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM purchases;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, address, phone_number FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%234%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM purchases_history WHERE purchase_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date = '2021-10-15';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE vendor_id = 1 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' AND customer_id > 100 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;

SELECT ph.purchase_date, p.product_name, ph.total_amount FROM purchases_history ph JOIN products p ON ph.quantity > 5 AND ph.purchase_id = p.product_id ORDER BY ph.purchase_date DESC, ph.total_amount ASC;

SELECT c.customer_name, v.vendor_name, p.product_name FROM customers c JOIN purchases_history ph ON c.customer_id = ph.customer_id JOIN products p ON ph.purchase_id = p.product_id JOIN vendors v ON p.vendor_id = v.vendor_id WHERE v.address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY c.customer_name, v.vendor_name ASC;
